abstract: Technology news site The Verge publishes leaked contract between Sony and Spotify; document reveals details that corroborate long-held suspicions about degree of control labels have over streaming services and relatively small amounts of money that are awarded to artists; embarrassment is compounded after Sony artist DJ Madeon criticizes corporation for its aggressive tactics against Soundcloud, a free streaming service.
lead_paragraph: Sony’s relationships with digital services were exposed last week when a now-outdated licensing contract with Spotify was leaked online and friction with SoundCloud spilled into view.

headline.main: Sony Terms With Spotify Uncovered in Contract
headline.print_headline: Sony Terms With Spotify Uncovered in Contract

snippet: Sony’s relationships with digital services were exposed last week when a now-outdated licensing contract with Spotify was leaked online and friction with SoundCloud spilled into view.
